BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("BigMoneys.txt"));
String line = reader.readLine();
while (line != null) {
    outputTextArea.append(line + "\n");
    line = reader.readLine();
}
reader.close();
<<<explanation>>>: In this code, we are using BufferedReader to read the file line by line. For each line, we append it to the JTextArea along with a newline character. We continue this process until there are no more lines to read in the file. After we are done, we close the BufferedReader.
